website_summaries.verdict: This bag is made of durable material and makes organization easy with its inner and outer pockets.
pros: Spacious bag has both inside and outside pockets to make organizing items simple
Bag has a strong, flat bottom
Made to be sturdy and long-lasting
Strap is comfortable and a convenient size
Top zipper closure helps keeps items safe, even when on the go
cons: Emits chemical smell when first taken out of packaging

customer_reviews.title: Zips all the way & sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for going to a Packer game was able to haul what was needed & meet stadium safety requirements. Was happy with the thickness of the clear vinyl & the straps were a good length. Most of the totes I first looked at, the zippers don't go the full length of the bag...this one DOES!!! Which was preferred to ensure my valuables (keys, wallet, phone) were not at risk, since they are so visible. Also purchased a vinyl decal to personalize the tote & it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Big Bag For The Price!!
customer_reviews.text: I work a job that requires me to carry a clear bag. This bag is perfect, the material seems to be fairly durable, it's huge, it has mega depth to it ,it also has a nice size inside and outside pocket for your smaller belongings. The bag is awesome for only $8. Thanks again Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good bag. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bag. I used it to go to work since we weren't allowed to have bags unless they were see-through. I imagine that in the future, it will be useful as a beach or gym bag since it's so easy to just hose it down whenever it gets dirty. The zipper has saved my notebooks multiple times(on rainy days). There's an inside pocket and an outside pocket. The inside pocket is only attached at the top of the pocket, so it can drag down that side of the top of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: This works great and the size is big enough to hold all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this bag. The first one lasted about a year. I work at a retail distribution center and I'm required to have a clear purse. This works great and the size is big enough to hold all my things and a jacket in case I get cold.
customer_reviews.author: tlc

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is the bag I was hoping to find. It's large and sturdy and should last a long time. I think it would be a good beach bag but I bought it to hold all of my carpet shampooer cleaning tools. What I like is that the bag is always easy to locate, the stuff inside is immediately located and my life, at that moment, is just a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: aries girl

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tote!
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to get my pink tote today and its surpassed my expectations! It's a nice sturdy flexible but soft vinyl, has a nice wide bottom gusset, and makes the perfect carrier for all my different weaving yarns. Overall just LOVE it and I'll be ordering at least two more in different colors. Edit: It fits over my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Noodle

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some other clear plastic bags this Dalix is nicely designed to hold items easily because of its curvature. It is comfortable to carry because of its generously sized straps and has pockets inside and out. It is reasonably priced. I ordered a few extra so I could store seasonal items and be able to easily identify them when I need to access them. The plastic is thick but pliable and is quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: BookAce

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I work in a secure facility so everything has to be in clear bags or containers. This bag is a great size and seems pretty study. I would definitely recommend this one. The price is really reasonable too!
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Decent, side stitching can allow pests or water in.
customer_reviews.text: Is sturdy so far. I did not think there would be stitching up the sides, the picture does not show it, if you are buying to keep dry or pests out this won't work. I bought it to keep anything from climbing into my things at work, we seem to have a bit of an issue with over 800 employees bringing pests to the workplace, luckily I bought the pink so if anything does get in I can see it. It is still useful despite the large stitching ( can fit at least head of a pencil through the loops). It is put together pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Finz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to carry all my supplies for work...clipboard, folders and notebook in the large compartment. Two side pockets are handy for smaller items. Zip top is a bonus if I ever use for another purpose. Not disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mifla

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 as beach totes for my family of 8. We have 2 little ones in diapers & 2 on formula. So, we used 1 bag at the beach for diaper stuff, formula, bottles, burp cloths, etc. It was great knowing that none of that stuff would get wet or sandy! We used the other one as a snack back. Being clear, it was great that we could easily see what we wanted to find. (I had another HUGE bag that we carried towels, toys, and sunscreen it, but it is mesh - so that's why I needed a water-proof & sand-proof bag.)
customer_reviews.author: tizpear

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: The bag is durable, seems like it will hold together. I bought several to use for crafts storage/transport, fabric. Unfortunately, they smell horrible. It's taken several weeks for them to off-gas, and still, up close, there's a plastic smell. I expected this, given the price. But don't expect to use the bag day 1 if you don't want your things (and you if you carry it) to smell like plastic.
customer_reviews.author: lasheliz

customer_reviews.title: BIG clear purse/tote
customer_reviews.text: At my job is require a clear purse, i was looking for something that will have a lot of space and still be comfortable enough to walk around with. This is PERFECT! BIG, you can fit a lot of things in it without the worry it will break. Great space and fit perfect in my locker. I can bring can of soda, lot of snacks, carry my job tools and even my sweater in case i get cold👍 I highly recommend this product. You can choose from variaty of colors.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. G.

customer_reviews.title: It really dependable.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a prison and have to use clear bags, for taking our food and items inside. I love thsee bags. I also buy them for some of my coworkers and they are really happy with them also. I have recommended these to other coworkers that like the bags and need one. I am also on two different teams at work a critical incident management team and hostage negotiator team. These bags come in handy to have a bag for each team ready so when I get the call I can leave. They are also water proof so when you get caught out in the rain everything stays nice and dry. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: It's great for the beach and adequate as a purse//tote required ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great for the beach and adequate as a purse//tote required in areas that require see-through bags. I have noticed that the bottom of the bag thins over time, and you can see tiny pin holes. Granted, I have a lot of stuff laying loose in the bag, and those items have hard corners that rub/poke into the bottom. Still, I love this bag and I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Satilla St. John

customer_reviews.title: Length
customer_reviews.text: Its long enough to fit my 19 inch ( give or take) grabber picker up-er.Bad part was the funny smell.Its going away though
customer_reviews.author: lavage2

customer_reviews.title: bought for my husband
customer_reviews.text: bought for my husband...he needed a clear see through lunch box for work and it works great fits: 2 sodas 2 teas various snacks (chips, oranges, candy, breakfast pastry) Salad Sandwich or freezer meal with room to spare
customer_reviews.author: family Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tote Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the purple & pink tote bags. I use them for my crochet projects, I can keep my yarn, pattern, stitch markers, scissors and hooks all in one place. They are great for a grab & go bag, and since they are clear, you can always see what is inside. Only draw back is the smell, they both smelled like bleach when taken out of the package. They did air out over night.
customer_reviews.author: mom4the4

customer_reviews.title: YES!! DURABLE AND ROOMY
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!! ROOMY & DURABLE Pockets and zipper are fantastic. Plastic flexible enough no cracking yet. ... 2nd one and ready to order #3! Office (yes, I lug quite a loss if files and such) Diaper bag Stadium Beach Works great for all!!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I use this for work and its very sturdy - serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work and its very sturdy - serves its purpose. The free one my workplace handed out ripped at the handle after 6 months of use. This one is still going strong. I will order this one again in a different color
customer_reviews.author: Kat B

customer_reviews.title: Great strong bag
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted for being able to carry items and see through. It is strong enough to carry almost anything you might keep in your purse. I even had a full bottle of hairspray in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy oversized tote bag. Stores plenty.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I wanted something to hold hair products and brushes for my little ones. I was storing things all over the house and needed something portable that could hold plenty. It’s a great, sturdy oversized tote bag with a canvas bottom. Would work for pool/beach too. Strong plastic odor at first was to be expected but should fade eventually.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great gameday bag option
customer_reviews.text: Great gameday bag. Love that it zips! Held two foam seat cushions, a reusable rain poncho, small towel, makeup bag & extra warm layer. Room to spare. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave it in the sun or in hot vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Tote is spacious and so convenient when it comes to working in an environment where clear purses are mandatory. The only negative I would say is if it’s left in a hot car the plastic sticks to itself (like the plastic pocket on the inside) and sticks to my binder plastic cover I have to kinda peel them off of each other. But doesn’t damage anything that’s the only thing I’ve notice while using this tote for work everyday since I received it. But I do love this tote and do recommend this to all my co workers
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Marin Rojo

customer_reviews.title: the bag is attractive and I liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Just FYI, the bag is attractive and I liked it a lot, however, it tore at a seam 2 weeks after the return date expired. I got 6 weeks of using it 5 days per week. Its very cheap so if you order it, don't expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Very durable! Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very thick plastic, I use to take lunch to work in. Actually rather lg for a lunch box, but I buy it for that reason. Also, because I work at the airport and need clear.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: roomy & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: fits everything including my water bottle and my coffee cup once I'm finished with it. 2 pockets are perfect for keys, phone and badge for work and meal bars and my nametag so I can grab them quickly in my booth. Handles fit on my shoulder so I don't need to carry it and you can see everything at a glance.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Harrison-Rouillard

customer_reviews.title: Security perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect beach bag, cruising, concerts... anything you need a clear travel bag for. This is what security people love to see coming through their line.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I do prison ministry and can only bring in a clear bag. This is cute and seems durable so far. Wish it had a shoulder strap as well though
customer_reviews.author: Krisi

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a kids toy bag
customer_reviews.text: Great for holding my daughters doctor pretend play toys. She can look right through and see what she needs. My hope is that she won’t always dump the bag, or maybe see the toys more and get more play out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole RL

customer_reviews.title: Great for eight bucks
customer_reviews.text: Holds all I need, insulated lunch bag, reading material, cell phone accessories, water bottle, jacket. Like the exterior slip pocket for easy access to mints and hard candies. The woven plastic fabric at the bottom feels thin
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag as a gift, and don't know yet how it will hold up. For the price and that it is plastic, it seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: mac maven

customer_reviews.title: Nice project bag for home and on the go
customer_reviews.text: I love this tote bag. I use it to store crochet projects that I am working on. Clear makes it easy to see which project I have in it. Then I can grab it and go and take it with me. I really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: ATANA

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Flexible!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, lightweight, lightweight! Not too small; not too big; just right! Flexible; not stiff. Pockets: one inside; one outside for small data. See through for easy identification. I have three bags: one for knitting; one for bridge note for the bridge studio and one extra for various monthly meetings such as book club, volunteer work, or workouts. Love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cruce

customer_reviews.title: Product does what it promises
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product for any person traveling, It saves you a lot to time and hassle when going through TSA.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Springer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bag like this. I use them every day to haul books and mail. The last one is still in service after a year and a half; it will probably last another couple of months at least.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie J

customer_reviews.title: Durable so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great for Corrections it’s only been about two months however it seems really durable and there is no separate of straps etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the tote is perfect for the beach. It will serve the purpose for my jewelry transportation. The pink is really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Geenahgee

customer_reviews.title: The perfect project bag.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bags last year for my 4H sewing group. Since I have new students added this year, I purchased more for them. I use my Cricut to put their names on them and they carry their current projects in the bag. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: KAE

customer_reviews.title: Easy organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of these bags. I took a purse liner and used it in one of the bags to keep my contents more organized! I've used mine for a crochet bag, and a purse.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Talbert Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. I’ll probably buy a few more to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Can't put too much in it. It is cheap plastic. It is good for beach towel and light weight items.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and was a good choice to take to the football game. I was able to put a half a case of water in it since it is a larger size bag.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My jewelry bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my business! So ladies can see what’s inside! Happens to be jewelry! Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and can handle some weight
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the bag. I am in love with having a clear bag. It is perfect for all of my Pure Romance supplies. The handles on the bag are strong and they handle a good bit of weight very well.9
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty sturdy. Larger than I thought, which is fine. I go thru these rather quickly, this one seems to be the most durable.
customer_reviews.author: sokie

customer_reviews.title: poo quality, zipper ripped in a month
customer_reviews.text: the zipper ripped in a month, so as soon as the return window closed. Poor quality product that cannot be relied on unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bartfeld

customer_reviews.title: Good size, value and quaility
customer_reviews.text: Great larger size clear bag for security checks at jobs that require clear bags and you can still have all the stuff you need inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use for sporting events!! Needed the room and appropriate bag for gear for grandkids!! Will work and has worked great so far!!
customer_reviews.author: kjreader

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Said it was ok for stadiums but it was not allowed at the University of Iowa. Cost 4.26 to mail it back and not happy with response.
customer_reviews.author: Chiara Atienza

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This bag is OK, I use it to take to concerts. I would feel better about buying it if it was made from recycled plastic.
customer_reviews.author: 1 rebel

customer_reviews.title: It’s more durable than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was much better than I had originally expected. I’ve always kind of believed “You get what you pay for.” But I was wrong when assuming this bag would be cheaply made. It is incredibly durable and worth more than you pay. I am an artist, and I use it for all my face painting gigs and body artwork, it is absolutely perfect. I definitely recommend this product for everyone. All ages, male/female/etc. wonderful buy.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be sturdy, has help up well so far
customer_reviews.text: I teach in jails and this transparent bag holds all my paperwork, computer & accessories so that I can easily work there.
customer_reviews.author: George M. Badger

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This bag is like a plastic never full. I can bring all of my girly necessities to work. I have to is this kind of bag in my field of work and the zipper is much needed for securing my personal items. Very happy great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: NYIS Services

customer_reviews.title: Larger than anticipated...
customer_reviews.text: My wife needs it for work... Bigger than she anticipated. She is debating whether to use it or return it. Her job is now requiring all employees to bring items (food etc.) to work in a clear see throu container.
customer_reviews.author: IKJLM

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: Using for knitting/crocheting projects - appreciate that I can “see” what’s inside
customer_reviews.author: rchetpeter

customer_reviews.title: Well made shopping bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for an airshow and multiple people asked where I purchased them from so you folks should get many more buyers! (: Durable bag which meets many security standards.
customer_reviews.author: lbsu49er

customer_reviews.title: Great Large Size Clear Purse
customer_reviews.text: My wife needed a purse for work that was clear and this serves its purpose. She loves the pockets which are great to hold hotel room keys or notes. This is big enough to fit a smaller laptop plus other items as well.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Great Clear Lg Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great clear large bag. I'm using it for my Yorkie dog and its nice that she can see her toys, bone, blanket etc. in her travel bag. And she lets me know she wants something out of there. too cute
customer_reviews.author: lauren w.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet but very large great size, has a smaller pocket very convenient! Seem to be very well made and durable ! My two teen girls loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Lhalli

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and pockets!
customer_reviews.text: It’s much prettier than picture. Everyone who does any kind of needlework should have one. Bag is very well made. Best of all, you can see which project is in it. I bought two; the other is pink. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wright

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice large size & made much better than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for me to place my delicate fabric and other nice bags/purses in to keep germ and dirt free : -). Love the zipper top too!!
customer_reviews.author: Myrtis Lewis

customer_reviews.title: A must have for high security jobs that require clear bags
customer_reviews.text: Required for work. It is what it is. The cats really love it for some reason. I'm the only one at work with cat teeth prints all long the seams. Well made and study.
customer_reviews.author: RogueHistorian

customer_reviews.title: Happy, so far - light & sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: For quick jaunts this is working great - fit under the plane seat.
customer_reviews.author: ECP

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and light
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and light. I used in summer and I got some compliments
customer_reviews.author: karylinda

customer_reviews.title: Work bag
customer_reviews.text: I am able to pack a lot of stuff into it. Closes easily and appears sturdy
customer_reviews.author: old school/ house head- girl

customer_reviews.title: love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this clear bag. It make seeing my yarn supply so easy for crochet!!
customer_reviews.author: sharon blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: My job requires clear bags. This bag of very sturdy and gets the job done. It is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DeShante

customer_reviews.title: Clear Shopping Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I can store lots of little items in it and see what is in the bag without opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very handy bag
customer_reviews.text: It was just as described. I like the large size, flat bottom, zip closure, and virtually unobstructed visibility. Not suitable for carrying a heavy load but more than adequate for light shopping or carrying a change of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: CMCC

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. She liked it. Not the best quality, not the worst.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tote
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected but that was a pleasant surprise. The pink color is bright and cheerful. It carries a lot of items and works great
customer_reviews.author: loretta

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ripped along the seam where the side pocket is so it’s unfunctional but still does the trick until I get another one
customer_reviews.author: Heather's

customer_reviews.title: Big bag
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. This bag is big, like an oversized purse or beach bag. I love the pockets inside and outside on this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous 1!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy clear tote bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is light and sturdy. It can carry many items, but is perfect to carry into facilities where only clear bags are allowed.
customer_reviews.author: Reader and Writer

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: This bag is excellent. It is spacious and well made. I should get a lot of use out of it. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V. Stefanini

customer_reviews.title: Great tote!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for situations where you need to easily identify and get to things in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J

customer_reviews.title: Great bag nice size with zipper.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy bag will buy again. Using it for all my sewing Threads. Organize and able to find quick.
customer_reviews.author: nancy ortiz

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke. I will use it since it is just for work. But I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna0987

customer_reviews.title: Super bag
customer_reviews.text: Well made, great value, perfect for carrying heavy books or using as a large tote/purse.
customer_reviews.author: B. Addison

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This bag holds all I needed to take to work, the company requires all items entering the store be visable. My personal belongings, lunch and required apparel all fit in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rogers-Kalchik

customer_reviews.title: Large cleat toe bag black trim
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as ordered, large clear tote bag with black trim. Taking this with me to hospital to bring clothes, socks, slippers when I have surgery.
customer_reviews.author: SheLovestheCity

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last longer
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty, have a nice size but they won't last a year if you use on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Ana

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for holding my Color Street product! I always get asked about it because its durable and holds a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kirsch

customer_reviews.title: Fits the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I use my bag daily, and my first bag lasted approximately a year in a half. I've ordered 2 different plastic bags, but unfortunately they did not accommodate my needs. The straps are just right to fit over the shoulder. Sturdy bag and plenty of room inside bag. The bag came in a timely manner as promised date.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I use this purse for my retail job. I love the size and the 2 pockets. I use one for my keys and the other for my bus pass and I D.
customer_reviews.author: redhead

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with quality and design.
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, able to hold things without feeling like it's going to too apart. Outside pocket and inside pocket, nice. Zipper works well. I work in assisted living with bed bugs, so I need the good zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tate

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use it to carry my lunch and books, it's very sturdy and a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not over pack bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Very durable bag for hair accessories... Snacks... Overnight clothes or a few books
customer_reviews.author: Shalisa Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this at my job in a correctional facility and it has seemed to hold up well. Definitely seems to be well made compared to other bags I’ve tried in the past. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah & Jason

customer_reviews.title: it is not 20"
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this bag but it is too small. the zipper is 20" when laid flat but since the base is 6", which makes the bottom of the bag only 17" long. If you really do not need a full 20", this will work nicely for you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I carry a lot of items in my security bag ...
customer_reviews.text: I carry a lot of items in my security bag because I work long hours. I still have the first tote. It's starting cracking because I work in the extreme heat (desert). But besides that, very strong bag. I've had my first one for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: perfect for what i needed it for. Good size, and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Durable bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a lot of room and is very durable. Plus it’s very stylish with it being transparent.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica H. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but sent it back for a different style...
customer_reviews.text: This bag did work well but I really prefer a bag that stands up and open on its own due to its structure. I used this bag once and was able to decide to whether or not I wanted to keep it so I sent it back and ordered the one my coworkers had.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved them
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves them very durable and spacious... Love the pockets
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Holds a lot more than I thought. 👏🏾
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a coworker for a secret Santa exchange and she loves it, uses it daily
customer_reviews.author: brandy blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag. The two pockets are nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. The two pockets are nice. Holds everything I need to work a 12 hour shift. Price is good. Last one lasted almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: T Butler
